alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued March 03 at 3:00PM EST until March 04 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills between 20 and 30 below zero expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Northern and North Woods Maine. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and the wind will combine to create low wind chills. Frostbite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken. Make sure you wear a hat and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
